Name: Shark Attack
About the game: One of the Most addictive Shark Game Play as a shark and you must do what you love! Swim around the ocean and fill your appetite by killing everything you can find. But Avoid hitting other big sharks and beware of underwater Warships in this hungry shark attack simulator game. Remember you have got a super defense power to throw some kind of poison which can destroy things as big as Under Water Warships. Start your ultimate shark attack swimming game to upset them as you watch out for hazards that can harm you. Have fun! Watch out for the underwater divers or hunters in the deep ocean and eat them & create rampage.Explore the mysterious world of underwater animals Complete your mission as fast as possible. Destroy everything that comes your way for survival. Take control of a very Hungry Shark in this action packed aquatic adventure. Survive as long as possible by eating everything that gets in your way! If you are a huge fan of other survival games, play Shark Attack – it’ll be just what you’re looking for. Shark Attack has fighting missions to hunt innocent swimming divers actually like other animal attack games. Completely new experience when you are on the edge of life and death! Begin your survival adventure now! The shark is hungry and enjoys the taste of humans especially. Now control the shark rushing from meal to meal, terrorizes the waters, go on a frantic ocean rampage, and come back with a full stomach. But be careful, you are not the only predator in the ocean! This game also includes 4 Big Bosses - Giant Octopus, Killer Whale, Giant Sea Turtle, and Dolphin. Enjoy! Hurry up!!! Features - Underwater environment. - A wide range of exciting sharks. - Fight in underwater battle arena. -Various battle stages
Developers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited
Publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private Limited
